page.title: 14PONY CLUBS
page.content:
Needwood is on the borders of the areas covered by the{Meynell}and the {South Staffordshire Pony Clubs,}both of which are very active with over 100 members each.
Both Pony Clubs organise{rallies}for their members who are taught not only the correct way to ride but also how to care for their horses and ponies. A system of{graded tests,}starting with D up to A and including a{Riding {and Road Safety Test,}provides a challenge for all.
Riders come from all over the midlands to the{horse trials, hunter trials}and other{competitions.} Both Clubs were successful in reaching the finals of some of the national competitions in 1985, the Meynell winning the national Pony Club Horse Trials Competition.
